comments: 美国第一例新肺炎患者，机器人配备摄像头、麦克风和听诊器，主治医生隔着玻璃窗户，操作医疗机器人进行治疗。患者住院前6天没有好转，第七天服用了一种治疗埃博拉病毒的实验性药物Remdesivir。之后迅速治愈，目前已经出院。
comments_en: The man, in his 30s, was the first confirmed case of US. He was evaluated using a robot. Fully recovered by now.

comments: 丈夫没有去过武汉，被间接感染，成为美国Person to person传染的第一例。
comments_en: A Chicago woman in her 60s returned to the United States on Jan. 13 from Wuhan, China. She's in stable condition and doing well.

comments: 这位患者的信息很少。入境机场和入境时间均无报道提及。
comments_en: A man in his fifties who arrived from Wuhan at LAX — is currently in isolation in a local hospital and in good condition.

comments: 亚利桑那州立大学学生。去过疫情爆发地 - 华南海鲜市场。并未住校内宿舍，而是在Tempe租房。
comments_en: ASU student who visited Wuhan recently. He lives in Tempe, not on campus.

comments: 患者到达洛杉矶机场之后，从机场立刻被送往医院。
comments_en: The patient arrived in Los Angeles Airport and was immediately sent to hospital.

comments: 美国第二例、芝加哥第一例确诊者的丈夫。没有去过疫区，是美国首例人传人。他在PIRHL LLC工作，曾去俄亥俄cleveland办公室出差。其孙子已经有发烧症状【已排除】
comments_en: First person-to-person transmission case. Husband of Chicago's first confirmed case. Works for PIRHL LLC. Recently visited the company's Cleveland office.

comments: 除两次出门看病外，没有离开家。
comments_en: First Bay Area Case. He recently traveled to Wuhan. He has largely been isolated at home since he returned to San Jose International Airport on Jan. 24 and only left his home twice to seek outpatient medical care.

comments: Umass Boston学生，二十多岁。
这对夫妇，丈夫从中国返回，就没离开家。【update】夫妻病情恶化后，被转移到UCSF治疗，但患者于3/4号痊愈。
comments_en:
The San Benito County cases are a husband and wife, both 57. The husband recently traveled to Wuhan, but his wife did not travel with him.

Both San Benito County coronavirus patients recovered

comments: 没去过武汉，被丈夫传染。【update】夫妻病情恶化后，被转移到UCSF治疗，但患者于3/4号痊愈。
comments_en:
Person to person transmission, by her husband.

Both San Benito County coronavirus patients recovered

comments: 除两次出门看病，没有离开家。
comments_en: A female who traveled from China to visit family in Santa Clara County is the second Bay Area case.Since arriving on January 23, she has only left her family's home twice to seek outpatient medical care

comments: 美国第十二例，威斯康星第一例确诊。所在地是madison，威斯康星大学主校区。患者过去两周去过中国，在国内接触过的人里有人确诊。这位患者目前情况良好，不需要住院，已经回家隔离。威斯康星还有十人在被检测，七人已经被排除(test negative)。出于隐私保护，患者所有信息保密。
comments_en: The patient is a Wisconsin resident who recently visited Beijing, China. the patient is doing well and is no longer in the hospital.

comments: 患者之前随撤侨飞机从武汉返美，在圣地亚哥一个美军基地入境。美国CDC对随机返回者进行隔离两周。患者目前状况良好，正在被继续隔离。评论：两次撤侨目前仅发现一人确诊，比例之低，美国真是开挂！
comments_en: The patient had been evacuated from Wuhan and under a 14-day quarantine at Marine Corps Air Station Miramar. Minimal symptoms. The patient had initially been released  back to quarantine after a possible mix-up with the test results.

comments: 美国确诊第十四例，也是之前撤侨飞机上回来的，2月7日入境之后在圣地亚哥一个美军基地被隔离。
comments_en: The patient returned to the U.S. on a State Department-chartered flight. Under a federal quarantine order after arrival on Feb 7, 2020.

comments: 美国第十五例确诊：2月7日从武汉返美的撤侨人员，性别男。一直在圣安东尼奥一处美军基地。同行91人都在被继续隔离。
comments_en: The individual was part of a group that arrived at San Antonio Air Force base on a State Department-chartered flight from Wuhan. Of the 91 people on the flight, only one showed symptoms.

comments: 日本游轮钻石公主号撤侨返回人员。目前在Napa。这是湾区第五例。
comments_en: First case in Napa County. Among the dozens of Americans on the Princess Diamond cruise ship under quarantine in Japan.

comments: 美国第17例，患者在加州一个偏远的地方。目前健康状况良好，在家隔离。官方没有透露其他任何消息。
comments_en: First case of COVID-19 confirmed in Humboldt County. Doing well and self-isolating at home

comments: 加州首府Sacramento确诊该郡第一例患者。患者返美旅途中就采取了防范措施，回到加州后自我隔离，目前情况良好，在家继续隔离。
comments_en: 1st case of coronavirus in Sacramento County. Doing quite well.

comments: 德州圣安东尼奥美军基地新增两例确诊，患者均为钻石公主号撤侨人员。
comments_en: Two evacuees from the Diamond Princess who were quarantined at Joint Base San Antonio-Lackland are infected with coronavirus.

comments: 之前，日本游轮钻石公主号撤侨人员里有3例确诊。2月21日，CDC宣布，累计有18人确诊，但没有提供细节。
comments_en: 18 total cases among returnees from Diamond Princess. No further details.

comments: 日本游轮钻石公主号撤侨人员再确诊18人，美国共计53例。
comments_en: Another 18 cases confirmed among returnees from Diamond Princess.

comments: 美国累计确诊57例，其中40例是日本钻石公主号游轮撤侨人员。
comments_en: US total cases reached 57. 40 from Diamond Princess cruise returnees.

comments: 钻石公主号游轮撤侨人员累计确诊42例，武汉撤侨人员确诊累计3例。
comments_en: So far, 42 total cases confirmed from Diamond Princess cruise returnees. 3 cases from Wuhan Chartered-flight returnees.

comments: 美国确诊首例不明传染途径病例，患者在北加，近期没有离开美国，也没有接触过确诊患者。这也是美国的第60例。
comments_en: 1st U.S. Coronavirus Case Of Unknown Origin From Solano County.

comments: 从日本游轮上下来，转到Marin hospital 医院进行治疗，这位患者是一位没有症状患者。
comments_en: Confirmed the transfer of one patient with laboratory-confirmed novel coronavirus (COVID-19) from Travis Air Force Base in Solano County to a Marin County hospital. An asymptomatic patient -- meaning the patient does not show symptoms of the virus, such as fever or difficulty breathing -- was transported to a Marin hospital on Wednesday night. The patient who tested positive for COVID-19 is one of the evacuees from the quarantined Diamond Princess cruise ship in Japan.

comments: 钻石公主号游轮撤侨人员再确诊两例，共计44例。
comments_en: 2 more cases confirmed from Diamond Princess returnees. total cruise ship returnee cases reached 44.

comments: 美国第63例确诊患者、湾区/北加第二例不明传染源患者，65岁的女性，没有去过疫区，没有跟确诊患者接触过。【更新】该患者于3/9病逝。
comments_en: 2nd U.S. Coronavirus Case Of Unknown Origin Discovered In Santa Clara County. 65 years old female. [Update] She passed away on Mar 9th.

comments: 这位患者在一所小学工作。2月19日开始有症状，俄勒冈Hillsboro一个实验室使用了CDC提供的检测工具，目前在等CDC正式确认，但既然州里发布了新闻，并且关闭了他任职的学校进行消毒，相信是test positive（确诊）。此人没有去过疫区、没有跟确认患者接触过，传染源不明（也就是community-transmitted）。
comments_en: A Lake Oswego elementary school employee contracted Oregon’s first case, causing the closure of the 430-student school.

comments: 男中学生，Jackson High School in Mill Creek，未知传染源，周一身体不适，感觉好点之后继续回校，周五确诊。目前在家隔离。
comments_en:
Student at Jackson High School announced Friday, isolating at home.

A Student at Jackson High School in Mill Creek (Everett Public Schools). Unknown Origin.

comments: King County 50来岁的女性，USPS员工，去过韩国，2月23返美工作。目前在家隔离，但无大碍。周二感觉不适，周三自动汇报，也是周五确诊。USPS发言人表示，患者在西雅图Federal Way分发中心工作，是一个信件处理工厂，以散件形式分发USPS营销信件和包裹服务。该厂不处理纸质信件，也不投递信件。
comments_en: A woman in her 50s who had traveled to South Korea. She turned to be the confirmed USPS Federal Way employee. Her work site is a network distribution center that doesn't deliver mails directly.

comments: 华盛顿州长宣布：King County出现美国首例新冠肺炎死亡。目前只知道是位男性（州长声明里使用 his），其他信息不明，下午1点会有新闻发布会。昨天全美确诊66例，第66例恰好也在华盛顿州，去过韩国，但是位女性。所以他是第67例。【更新】这名男性曾经住院，病逝于 EvergreenHealth。
comments_en: First death caused by coronavirus in U.S. A King County man in his 50s died at EvergreenHealth hospital.

comments: 在华盛顿州Kirkland一家名为LifeCare的养老院，一位70多位的老妇人病情比较严重，在EvergreenHealth医院接受治疗，于3/2病逝
comments_en: A woman in her 70s who was a resident of LifeCare in Kirkland and is hospitalized at EvergreenHealth.

comments: 这位女性40来岁，是Kirkland养老院LifeCare的工作人员，她周四就被送往Overlake医院了。养老院一共有108位老人和180位工作人员，其中有27位老人和25位工作人员有疑似症状。这位
comments_en: A woman in her 40s who employed by LifeCare. She remains hospitalized at Overlake Medical Center. The facility has 108 residents and 180 employees. 27 residents and 25 employees have symptoms.

comments: 伊利诺伊州Cook County 新增一例，患者正在医院隔离，70多岁男子，情况稳定
comments_en: A man in his 70s in suburban Cook County tested positive. The third case in Illinois.

comments: 跟Santa Clara2月28周五（未知传染源）确诊的人有过”household“接触。但这位成年女性 not hospitalized or ill
comments_en: An adult woman who "is a household contact of the third Santa Clara County case."

comments: 患者男性，40来岁，近期去过意大利。回美之后，并没有去公司工作，接触的人有限。评论：有些新闻提到了”in their 40s“和”since their return“，但只说一人确诊，估计是一家人一起去意大利。
comments_en: A man in 40s. Traveled to Italy in mid-February. Didn't go back to work after his return. Very limited contact with others.

comments: 华盛顿州一位60来岁的男性患者确诊，目前在Valley Medical Center in Renton，这位患者情况不太好：in critical but stable condition
comments_en: A man in his 60s. In critical but stable condition at Valley Medical Center in Renton.

comments: 华盛顿州一位60来岁的男性患者确诊，目前在Virginia Mason Medical Center. 他的情况危急 in critical condition
comments_en: A man in his 60s. In critical condition at Virginia Mason Medical Center

comments: 医护感染，在NorthBay VacaValley Hospital工作，接触过之前UC Davis医学中心治疗的社区传播患者，居家隔离中。
comments_en: NorthBay VacaValley Hospital health care worker. In isolation at home. Exposed to the community-acquired case hospitalized at UC Davis Medical Center.

comments: 医护感染，在NorthBay VacaValley Hospital工作，接触过之前UC Davis医学中心治疗的社区传播患者，居家隔离中。
comments_en: NorthBay VacaValley Hospital health care worker. In isolation at home. Exposed to the community-acquired case hospitalized at UC Davis Medical Center.

comments: 成年女性，患有慢性疾病，已住院。
comments_en: A woman who officials said has chronic health conditions. Hospitalized

comments: 成年男性，是另一确诊病例的丈夫，患有慢性疾病，已住院，有埃及旅行史。
comments_en: A husband and wife who recently traveled to Egypt. Hospitalized.

comments: 成年女性，是另一确诊病例的妻子，已住院，有埃及旅行史。
comments_en: A husband and wife who recently traveled to Egypt. Hospitalized.

comments: 30多岁女性，住在纽约曼哈顿，去过伊朗，居家隔离中，是Emergency medical services的工作人员， 也是纽约市第一例确诊病例的应急人员。
comments_en: First Confirmed Case in New York. A woman in her 30s returned from Iran last week. She is an EMS worker and  is the first NYC emergency responder with a confirmed case.

comments: 80多岁女性， EvergreenHealth in Kirkland住院，有基础疾病，情况危重。【更新】3月1日病逝。
comments_en: A female in her 80s, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. The woman has underlying health conditions, and is in critical condition

comments: 90多岁女性， EvergreenHealth in Kirkland住院，有基础疾病，情况危重. 【更新】3月3日病逝。
comments_en: A female in her 90s, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. The woman has underlying health conditions, and is in critical condition

comments: 70多岁男性，EvergreenHealth in Kirkland住院，有基础疾病，情况危重。
comments_en: A male in his 70s, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. The man has underlying health conditions, and is in critical condition

comments: 70多岁男性，EvergreenHealth in Kirkland治疗，有基础疾病，2月29日病逝
comments_en: Second coronavirus death in King County. A male in his 70s was hospitalized at EvergreenHealth. He had underlying health conditions and died on 2/29/20

comments: 40多岁男性， 在Kirkland的EvergreenHealth住院。他是 Snohomish 县居民。他并不是 LifeCare 的员工。他有基础疾病。病逝。
comments_en:
Previously announced male in his 40s hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland has died. The patient was a Snohomish County resident. He was not an employee at LifeCare. He did have underlying conditions. No additional details are available at this time. 

Third case in Snohomish County. A male in his 40s, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. In critical condition.

comments: Sarasota市一位63岁男性，近期没有去过CDC限制旅行的国家。
comments_en: An adult in Manatee County

comments: Hillsborough一位女性29岁患者，去过意大利。
comments_en: An adult in Hillsborough County with a history of travel to Italy.

comments: 青少年，去过意大利，轻症，居家隔离中
comments_en: 2nd person in RI. A teenage girl took part in a mid-February trip to Europe organized by St. Raphael’s Academy

comments: 患者解除隔离后，第二次检测呈阳性，重新隔离中。此案例有疑问是否该算在武汉撤侨中，CDC和TX官网都未收录。
comments_en:
CDC mistakenly released a patient from the San Antonio Texas Center for Infection Disease Sunday. The patient returned to isolation after a pending, subsequent lab test came up positive.

Not sure if this one should be Wuhan exvacuee. This case wasn't count in CDC website nor TX official website https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/php/preparing-communities.html

comments: 是俄勒冈州第一例患者的家庭接触者，居家隔离中。
comments_en: 2nd Oregon case, household contact with the first case in Oregon

comments: 3月2日早晨，CDC网站汇报钻石公主号游轮撤侨人员中新增一例、累计45例。
comments_en: Confirmed case increased by one and reached a total of 45 from Diamond Princess returnees, according to CDC website.

comments: 新罕布什尔州首例，去过意大利，在家治疗中
comments_en: 1st case in NH, patient had recently traveled to Italy and is now receiving treatment at home.

comments: 是伊利诺伊州第3例的妻子，70多岁，在家治疗中，情况稳定
comments_en: The individual is a woman in her 70s and is the spouse of the third case – a man in his 70s.  This fourth case is quarantined at home and is complying with health officials.  Both cases are reported to be in good condition.

comments: Oregon第3例，曾去过Umatilla County middle school的青少年篮球赛，在Providence St. Mary Medical Center治疗。与Oregon前2例无关，不明途径感染，属社区传播。
comments_en: 3rd Oregon case, an adult who attended a youth basketball game at a Umatilla County middle school. The person is now at Providence St. Mary Medical Center. unrelated to the two others in Oregon, and the state is treating it as a “community transmission,”

comments: 在其他县与确诊病人接触；目前在家隔离。
comments_en: an adult male who had contact with a confirmed case in another county and is now under home isolation.

comments: 在Santa Clara县与确诊病人接触；目前在家隔离。
comments_en: an adult male who had contact with a previously confirmed case in Santa Clara County. That person is also under home isolation.

comments: San Mateo County第2例确诊（San Mateo County首例是撤侨确诊病例转院），成年人。在医院隔离。传染源未知。
comments_en: An adult who is currently in isolation at the hospital. The county says the source of that person's exposure is unknown.

comments: 80多岁女性，LifeCare养老院居民。在EvergreenHealth 住院，目前情况危重。
comments_en: A female in her 80s, a resident of LifeCare, was hospitalized at EvergreenHealth. She is in critical condition.

comments: 患者从旧金山到墨西哥到邮轮返回，在 Sonoma 县居住的10天中发现新冠症状。目前已在当地医院隔离。
comments_en: The patient had recently returned from a cruise ship that departed from San Francisco to Mexico. The patient, who has been in Sonoma County for 10 days, is showing symptoms of coronavirus and is currently in stable condition and under isolation at a local hospital.

comments: 40多岁女性，目前住院，有基础疾病。
comments_en: A female in her 40s, currently hospitalized with underlying health conditions.

comments: 加州第24例确诊，是与另一位确诊在Solano County的患者有过接触的医护人员
comments_en: A resident in Placer County has presumptively tested positive for the Coronavirus Disease 2019, according to the Placer County Public Health.

comments: 麻州第2例，二十多岁女性，住在Norfolk County，和学校组团去过意大利，曾随同Rhode Island一所Catholic High School一同去过Italy，且在旅途当中至少同RI州已被确诊的两名患者中的一人有过频繁接触，回来后出现新冠症状，现居家恢复中。
comments_en: Of all the cases across the Commonwealth, 10 patients had to be hospitalized, while 101 of the patients did not need any hospitalization.

comments: 乔治亚首例， 在Fulton County， 男性，去过意大利米兰，现在都在家中隔离。
comments_en: 1st in Georgia. Man, had traveled to Milan, Italy. Being quarantined inside their home.

comments: 乔治亚第2例， 在Fulton County， 是乔治亚第1例去过意大利米兰的患者家庭接触者。
comments_en: 2nd in Georgia, household of the 1st case who traveled to Milan, Italy. Being quarantined inside their home.

comments: 70多岁男性，LifeCare养老院居民。在Kirkland 的 EvergreenHealth 住院，有基础疾病。3/1/2020 病逝。
comments_en: A male in his 70s, a resident of LifeCare, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. The man had underlying health conditions, and died 3/1/20

comments: 70多岁女性，LifeCare养老院居民。在EvergreenHealth 住院，有基础疾病。3/1/2020 病逝。
comments_en: A female in her 70s, a resident of LifeCare, hospitalized at EvergreenHealth in Kirkland. The woman had underlying health conditions, and died 3/1/20

comments: 50多岁男性，在 Highline 医院住院。无已知传染源。情况稳定但是病情危重，他先前没有基础疾病。
comments_en: A male in his 50s, hospitalized at Highline Hospital. No known exposures. He is in stable but critical condition. He had no underlying health conditions.

comments: Sacramento官网3/2最新数据显示，在第一例确诊后，又有两例确诊。
comments_en: Two additional cases are confirmed according to the official website (updated on 3/2)

comments: 【更新】这例病例现在被很多媒体归为NYC，特此修正。纽约州第2例，住在Westchester，在曼哈顿工作， 没有过直接接触史，但是去过迈阿密。现在在医院治疗。
comments_en: This case was counted in NYC. The 2nd in New York, commute worker in Manhanttan. He is now hospitalized with an underlying respiratory illness. No direct connection to China or any country on the watch list. However, he did travel to Miami.

comments: 一名20多岁的男子，没有住院，在家治疗中。该男子是一位州外去过社区传播地区的确诊病例的接触者。
comments_en: A man in his 20s who is not hospitalized and is recovering at home. The man is a known contact of a "presumptive positive" coronavirus case outside of Arizona who recently traveled to an area with community spread of the virus

comments: 佛罗里达州第3例， 病人是之前确诊患者的妹妹。她们都去过意大利。这位确诊患者的室友也正在测试中。(注：这一例是加州居民，在佛罗里达属于out-of-state的病例)
comments_en: A third presumptive positive case of COVID-19 coronavirus has been found in Florida. She is the sister of the Hillsborough County woman who tested positive Sunday after a trip to Italy. (Note: this is a CA resident, but isolated in FL, and belongs to 1 of 3 out-of-states cases according to Florida Health website.)

comments: 第7例死亡病例， 病人也来自LifeCare养老院，于上周被送往Harborview Medical Center并于两天后死亡，死亡六天后被确诊。
comments_en: A person who died last week in a Seattle hospital had the coronavirus, tests have shown, , and raising the death toll in the country to seven.

comments: 华州，King county新增病例，40多岁女性，系Life Center工作人员，未曾住院，目前在家恢复中。
comments_en: A female in her 40s, worked at LifeCare, never hospitalized and is recovering at home

comments: 华州，King county 新增病例， 60多岁女性，家庭成员已被确诊，系人传人，尚未住院。
comments_en: A female in her 60s, family member of a confirmed case of COVID-19, not hospitalized

comments: 华州，King county 新增病例， 70多岁男性，有频繁到访Life Center的经历，是否住院尚不明确。
comments_en: A male in his 70s, a frequent visitor of LifeCare, hospitalization status unknown currently

comments: 华州， King county新增病例， 20多数男性， 未知感染源，现住院于 Swedish Issaquah。
comments_en: A male in his 20s, unknown exposure, hospitalized at Swedish Issaquah

comments: 两位丹佛市居民被确诊。均表现出症状，但尚未住院。两位患者最近都有州外的旅游史， 一位患者刚从加拿大温哥华回来，另一位患者坐了邮轮回来，但是官方没有给出邮轮的具体信息。这两位患者是科罗拉多州的第4，5位患者。
comments_en:
Denver health officials on Friday said two city residents have tested positive for the novel coronavirus.
both patients recently returned from out-of-state travel — one from Vancouver, Canada, and one from a cruise ship, though officials did not say where the cruise had gone.

comments: 内布拉斯加州第1例确诊，曾去往英国。周四出现严重肺炎症状和细菌感染。目前其家人是否感染仍然未知，与此同时工作人员正在调查与之相关的接触者和地点。

An investigation is underway by an epidemiology team to see who else this individual has had contact with and where.

Two more deaths from coronavirus were reported Saturday, bringing the total to 17 in Washington state. So far, at least 104 have tested positive for COVID-19, health officials said.

One death is associated with Life Care Center while another is with a patient who was treated at EvergreenHealth Medical Hospital. The new death comes just one day after three people died at EvergreenHealth.

Public Health was following up on people who might have been exposed and an investigation was underway to determine how the individual contracted the disease.

(Previously reported two cases are not CT residents but work in CT.) The patient, a Wilton resident, who is between the ages of 40 and 50, is being treated at Danbury Hospital. The person most likely became infected with the virus that causes COVID-19 during a recent trip to California and sought medical care shortly after returning to Connecticut, Lamont said.

comments: 田纳西州第三例。患者系成年女性，已经自我隔离。并非旅行相关，原因待查。

City and state health officials are identifying other people she may have had contact with and still attempting to determine the origins of her infection.

comments: 印第安纳州第二例患者， 该患者为 Hendricks County居民，目前只有轻微症状，现在家自我隔离。该患者在2月 末参加了biogen 的公司年会，于3月2号开始有流感样症状。现在全国范围内有差不多10多名患者的发病与这次会议有关，其中也包括了印第安纳州第一例患者，这位Marion County的患者现在仍然只有轻微症状，现在家隔离。
comments_en:
The patient lives in Hendricks County and tested 'presumptive positive'. The patient is in isolation with mild symptoms and is not hospitalized, according to ISDH.

"The patient traveled to Boston in late February to attend the BioGen conference and developed mild flu-like symptoms on March 2," ISDH said in a press release issued Sunday. More than a dozen COVID-19 cases nationwide have been tied to that conference, including the patient in Marion County who was identified Friday as the state's first coronavirus case. The Marion County patient also remains in isolation at this time with mild symptoms.

Two of the individuals had underlying health conditions while one did not. None required hospitalization and are recovering at home in isolation. All three individuals were part of a cruise in Egypt.

comments: 明州第二例确诊，50多岁，2月下旬去过欧洲旅行。 该患者在3月2日出现症状，并在周六就医，周日确诊。目前在家隔离。
comments_en:
A second case of coronavirus in MN. The latest case is a resident of Carver County who's in their 50s, and likely was exposed to the virus while traveling in Europe in late February. The patient developed symptoms on March 2 and sought medical treatment on Saturday; testing came back positive Sunday. The person is in isolation at home and is recovering.
[UPDATE 03/12]: Resident in their 50s who was likely exposed while traveling in Europe in late February. They began to develop symptoms on March 2 and sought care on March 7. They are in isolation and recovering at home. Health officials say the patient had contact with 12 people in three households.

comments: 内布拉斯加州第2/3例确诊，系首例患者的家属。暂无更多信息。
comments_en: Douglas County health officials confirmed two new "presumptive positive" cases of coronavirus Sunday. Officials said these cases stem from a case reported Friday of a 36-year-old woman who had traveled to the United Kingdom.

comments: 加州Shasta County首例确诊，一名50多岁左右男子，近期有旅行史，目前在家隔离。
comments_en: Shasta County, California, has confirmed its first presumptive positive case of coronavirus, the county’s health and human services agency announced in a press release Sunday. The patient is a man in his 50s who is recovering in isolation at home. He had a history of recent travel and public health staff are working to identify anyone who may have been in close contact with the patient, the release said.

comments: 夏威夷第二例确诊，一名Oahu岛老人，近期曾到华盛顿州旅行。他在3月2日发病，4日回到夏威夷并直接去了医院，但在初次就诊时未进行COVID-19测试。 7日被一辆救护车送往医院，随后确诊。
comments_en: Department of Health officials announced a second case of COVID-19 in Hawaii on Sunday. He is an elderly man who lives on Oahu who recently traveled to Washington State. Officials said he fell ill on March 2 and returned to Hawaii on March 4 when he went directly to a hospital. During his initial visit, a coronavirus test was not done. An ambulance then took him to a hospital on March 7 when hospital staff then decided to conduct the COVID-19 test, which came back as a presumptive positive.

comments: 乔治亚周日新增4例病例，其中一位坐标Fulton County。目前住院中。【更新】其中一名病例为Fulton County School的员工，Fulton County School宣布所有受影响学校停课。
comments_en: The Georgia Department of Public Health announce addition of four presumptive positive cases of COVID-19 on Sunday night. One individual is from Fulton County, an employee at Fulton County School. Fulton County Schools has decided to enact immediate dismissal at the impacted schools."

comments: 乔治亚周日新增4例病例，其中一位坐标Cherokee County。目前住院中。【更新】患者为Waffle House的员工，3月1号以后没有上班，所在餐厅已关门，在进行彻底消毒。
comments_en: The Georgia Department of Public Health announce addition of four presumptive positive cases of COVID-19 on Sunday night. One individual is a Waffle House employee from Cherokee County. The employee has not been at work since March 1 and has been released from the hospital under quarantine, the company said in a statement. “We temporarily have closed the restaurant located at 1849 Marietta Hwy in Canton, GA.,” the statement said. “During the restaurant closure, we sanitized the restaurant thoroughly, using methods specifically designed to clean and disinfect.”

comments_en:
Officials also announced four new presumed cases of coronavirus Tuesday, bringing the state total to 15 just a day after Gov. Phil Murphy declared a public health emergency to set efforts in motion to keep the virus from spreading. 
Two of the new cases were in Bergen County, including the patient who died. The county now has seven presumed coronavirus cases. Some of those patients have links to a cluster of cases in Westchester County, New York. 
{UPDATE] by 3/10/2020
A 69-year-old man in New Jersey was the first person in the state to die from the new coronavirus, officials announced on Tuesday.

The man, who lives in Bergen County, had a history of health problems before contracting coronavirus, the state’s health commissioner, Judith Persichilli, said.

He was admitted to Hackensack Medical Center over the weekend, and suffered two heart attacks, Ms. Persichilli said. Three other people tested positive on Tuesday for coronavirus in New Jersey, bringing the statewide total to 15.

comments: 明尼苏达州第3例确诊，患者30多岁，2/28出现症状，3/9就医，现处于重症。
comments_en:
The Minnesota Department of Health has confirmed a third case of coronavirus in the state.

Officials say the patient, a resident of Anoka County in their 30s, is believed to have been exposed through contact with international travelers. They are hospitalized in critical condition, MDH says. The case is considered presumptive, as MDH is awaiting confirmation from the CDC.

Resident in their 30s who was likely exposed through contact with international travelers. They developed symptoms on Feb. 28. They sought care on March 3, were evaluated and released. They sought care again on March 9. The patient is currently hospitalized in critical condition.

comments: 俄勒冈州第15例确诊，Multnomah County第1例确诊，无近期旅行史，传染源未知。
comments_en:
The Oregon Health Authority today announced Multnomah County’s first presumptive positive case of COVID-19. The new case brings Oregon’s total to 15 cases in seven counties.

This case is being treated at Portland Veterans Affairs Medical Center. The individual had no known contact with a confirmed case, and had not traveled from a country where the virus is circulating, so the case is being investigated as a community-acquired case.

comments: 田纳西州再新增一例，位于Sullivan County，累计确诊7例。病人情况未知。

comments: 纽约州Rockland County新增2例。

comments: 新罕布什尔第5例确诊，Rockingham County第2例确诊，患者男性，目前在家隔离。
comments_en: The New Hampshire Department of Health and Human Services announced Tuesday the fifth presumptive positive test result in the state for COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus. The person is a man from Rockingham County who is self-isolated at home, officials said.

comments: 伊利诺伊州新增8例。其中Cook County6例，一位70多岁男性，一位60多岁女性，一位40多岁女性和三位40多岁男性。
comments_en: There are eight new cases of coronavirus in Illinois, state officials announced Tuesday afternoon, bring the total number in the state to 19. New cases include four people from Cook County -- a man in his 70s, a woman in her 60s, a woman in her 40s and a man in his 40s.

comments: 伊利诺伊州新增8例中的1例，Kane County首例确诊，一名60多岁女性，无近期旅行史。
comments_en: There are eight new cases of coronavirus in Illinois. The cases include the first outside of Chicago and Cook County. They include a Kane County woman in her 60s and a McHenry County teen. Neither had a history of travel to areas affected by the illness or any connection with a known case of COVID-19.

They had been on the same Egyptian cruise as the previous seven positive results from that county. All of the new cases are adults between the ages of 61 and 80. The new cases in Johnson County are in isolation at home and are recovering.

The first presumptive positive case of coronavirus has been confirmed in Tarrant County.

comments: 加州San Joaquin County新确诊了该郡的第一例患者，该患者早前曾做过游轮，这位患者一直都有新肺炎症状，并于几天前开始住院。其他信息不详。
comments_en: San Joaquin County Public Health Services confirmed its first case of the coronavirus. The individual was a passenger on the Grand Princess cruise ship, but was not on the cruise that most recently disembarked in Oakland. The individual has been symptomatic and was hospitalized several days ago.

comments: 到目前为止加州Contra Costa county确诊十例，其中四例有接触过感染者，其余六例感染途径不明。
comments_en: Contra Costa County officially has 10 confirmed cases of COVID-19 as of Tuesday morning, of those, four were known to have had contact with people who previously tested positive, while six had no recent history of travel outside the U.S. or known contact with a confirmed case.

comments: 科罗拉多3/10累计确诊达18例（包括一名Indeterminate 病例）， 其中Denver County累计确诊5例（且包含Indeterminate病例）。

comments: 德州Harris新增1例，患者为一名20-30岁之间的女性，之前在意大利暂住。回到美国后，在出现轻度流感症状后，联系了她的医生，随后被确诊。
comments_en: Harris County Public Health (HCPH) is reporting an additional presumptive positive case of COVID-19 in Harris County. Officials said the case involves a woman between 20 to 30 years old who was temporarily living abroad in Italy. They said she contacted her healthcare provider when she returned and exhibited mild flu-like symptoms. The woman was then tested for coronavirus.

comments: 纽约州Suffolk County新增3例。一位是Brookhaven的20多岁男性，在Stony Brook University Medical Center隔离；一位是Southold的20多岁女性，在家中隔离；还有一位80多岁男性，目前在St. Catherine's Hospital隔离。
comments_en: Three more positive coronavirus cases have been confirmed in Suffolk County, bringing the total in the county to four cases. County Executive Steve Bellone said the first patient is a Town of Brookhaven resident in his early 20s. Bellone said the patient is in isolation at Stony Brook University Medical Center. The second patient is a Southold resident in her early 20s who is under home isolation. The third patient is in his 80s and is in isolation at St. Catherine's Hospital.

comments: 周二一位90多岁Sacramento County居民去世，是加州第三例死亡病例。
comments_en: Sacramento County announces a resident in their 90s has died of complications from coronavirus. The person was in an assisted living facility with an underlying health condition. The death is the third coronavirus-related death in the state.On Tuesday, Sacramento County health officials announced that a patient in her 90s at an Elk Grove nursing home had died from COVID-19. The woman is the third confirmed death from COVID-19 in California, and she is the state’s first known case of infection with the coronavirus in a nursing home. Health officials said that all patients in the nursing home would be tested for the virus, but that effort was delayed by a lack of test kits.

comments: 密歇根首2例确诊。其中一位是Oakland County居民，成年女性，近期有海外旅行史。
comments_en: The first two cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Michigan. The cases are in Oakland and Wayne counties. The Oakland County resident is an adult female and had a recent history of international travel。

comments: 密歇根首2例确诊。其中一位是Wayne County居民，成年男性，近期有国内旅行史。
comments_en: The first two cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Michigan. The cases are in Oakland and Wayne counties. The Wayne County resident is an adult male had a history of domestic travel. Both patients are middle-aged, according to Whitmer.

comments: Montgomery郡第一例患者被确认为是东部小镇Patton Village的一位警官，2/28参加过Rodeo和烧烤活动。
comments_en: A man in his 40s who tested first for presumptive positive COVID-19 in Montgomery County is reportedly a Patton Village officer.

comments: 加州Calaveras County新增两个病例，其中一位是儿童，就读于Copperopolis Elementary School。 这两位患者是父子关系，父亲在工作的时候感染病毒，从而传染到孩子，现两人都在家隔离。
comments_en: Calaveras County Health Officials report that two residents have tested positive for the coronavirus and one is a child. The child is a student at Copperopolis Elementary School。Those infected are two members of a family that lives in the Copperopolis area, according to Kelaita. He details that the father’s contact at work led to the exposure and his daughter was then infected.

comments: 佛州新增8例，其中1例不是佛州本地居民，来自Georgia，68岁女性，目前在Alachua County。新增患者近期均有旅行史。
comments_en: Florida Dept. Health has announced eight new positive Florida COVID19 cases, including an Non-Florida resident. She is a 68 years old Georgia resident, who is currently in Alachua County, has also tested positive for the virus. All individuals are being appropriately cared for and isolated. All of them are travel related.

comments: 德州Dallas郡第2例确诊，是Dallas County第1例确诊的密切接触者，早先已在医院隔离治疗。
comments_en: The second individual is in their 50's and is a close contact with the first case. Health officials said since the second case is a previously identified close contact of the first case, this was expected and is not cause for concern, adding these cases are not indicative of community spread.

comments: 加州首府Sacramento现确诊一例患者在老年中心， 但这位90多岁Sacramento County居民当天去世，是加州第三例死亡病例。
comments_en:
Earlier Tuesday, the county confirmed that a resident at a senior living facility tested positive for the new coronavirus and was hospitalized. An email sent Monday to family members of residents at the Carlton Senior Living Elk Grove — which has approximately 140 residents — stated a resident there tested positive.

It appears to be the first confirmed COVID-19 case in a California senior facility. County public health departments, however, have only released limited details about where individual cases are confirmed, so there could be more that have not been made public.
Sacramento County announces a resident in their 90s has died of complications from coronavirus. The person was in an assisted living facility with an underlying health condition. The death is the third coronavirus-related death in the state.On Tuesday, Sacramento County health officials announced that a patient in her 90s at an Elk Grove nursing home had died from COVID-19. The woman is the third confirmed death from COVID-19 in California, and she is the state’s first known case of infection with the coronavirus in a nursing home. Health officials said that all patients in the nursing home would be tested for the virus, but that effort was delayed by a lack of test kits.

comments: 内布拉斯加州第5例确诊，学生。【更新】该学生3月4号到Lincoln，与亲戚一起居住。上周曾参加过Lincoln女子州立中学的几场篮球比赛。
comments_en: A fifth presumptive positive case of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has been reported to the Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services (DHHS). DHHS is awaiting final confirmation from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). 【update】The Lincoln-Lancaster County Health Department (LLCHD) today confirmed that a student who attended the girls’ state high school basketball games in Lincoln last week has been diagnosed with COVID-19. Local health officials have contacted the Lincoln relatives with whom the student stayed and are investigating any other contacts the student may have had in the community. The Lincoln relatives are currently self-quarantined and display no symptoms. The student arrived in Lincoln March 4 and stayed with relatives. The student is reported to have gone onto the basketball court after the 9 a.m. game to hug family members.

Another Virginia resident was diagnosed with coronavirus, the governor announced, bringing the state total to nine. The latest patient lives in the Ashland area and was diagnosed after traveling internationally.
A Hanover County teenager has tested positive for COVID-19, marking the first known case of the coronavirus in the metropolitan Richmond area. The teen was the state's ninth case of COVID-19.

comments: 亚利桑那州Maricopa County新增一例确诊, 男性患者90多岁，现情况稳定已经住院治疗。 现有亚利桑那州9例患者。
comments_en:
Pinal and Maricopa counties report 3 new coronavirus cases, bringing state total to 9。 
Maricopa County Department of Public Health says a new presumptive positive case involves a man in his 90s.  Officials say the patient is recovering at the hospital and is stable condition.

comments: 亚利桑那州Pinal County新增两例确诊, 患者60多岁，和以前的一位确诊患者为同一家人，情况稳定隔离在家。 现有亚利桑那州9例患者。
comments_en:
Pinal County health officials say there are now five cases of coronavirus spread person-to-person in the county.

On Wednesday, Pinal County Public Health Department said two more residents were diagnosed with coronavirus.

Both cases are from the same household as the previously reported three cases.
The new patients are over 60 years old and are said to be recovering at home.

comments: 明尼苏达州Olmsted County第4例确诊, 为50多岁患者，有旅游史，于3/5日出现症状，3/9日就医，期间曾工作过，在工作期间可能有传染性，现已经通知有关同事。
comments_en:
Two more presumptive cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed through state testing in residents of Ramsey and Olmsted counties, public health officials said Wednesday morning. 
In both instances, the patients have international travel history, with both currently recovering from home.

The Olmsted County case, a patient in their 50s, showed symptoms on Mar. 5 and sought testing on Mar. 9. They became symptomatic at work.

The Olmsted case involved someone who may have been infectious while at work, and state health officials are working with that employer now to identify anyone who may now be at risk.

comments: 3名患者在Aspen地区确诊，皆曾与一位已知的澳洲病患接触。

one has no history of travel to a country with known community transmission and no known contacts with a confirmed COVID-19 case.

comments: 明尼苏达州Ramsey County第5例确诊, 患者30多岁，曾有出国旅游史。患者3/6日出现症状，3/10开始治疗。
comments_en:
The Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) says the infected person is a Ramsey County resident in their 30s who was likely exposed to COVID-19 while traveling internationally. 
The patient developed symptoms on Mar. 6 and received care on Mar. 10. Samples were sent to the MHD Public Health Laboratory and the test was found positive late Tuesday.
In both instances, the patients have international travel history, with both currently recovering from home.

comments: 洛杉矶出现首例死亡病例，一位60多岁女性，非当地居民，但刚好来拜访朋友。她曾在Pomona Valley Hospital接受治疗。
comments_en: Los Angeles County reported its first coronavirus-related death on Wednesday and announced six new cases, including one suspected of being community-acquired. The person who died was a woman over 60 who wasn’t a resident and was visiting friends, Los Angeles County Department of Public Health director Barbara Ferrer said at news conference Wednesday. The woman had recently traveled extensively over the past month, including having a long layover in South Korea. She was briefly treated at Pomona Valley Hospital.

comments: 洛杉矶新增确诊6例。新病例中，有一人感染源不明，疑似为洛杉矶第二起社区传染病例。
comments_en: Los Angeles County reported its first coronavirus-related death on Wednesday and announced six new cases, including one suspected of being community-acquired. Officials also reported six additional positive cases, bringing the total number of cases up to 27 in the county. This also includes the three cases previously reported by the city of Long Beach. Three of the new reported cases were people who were in contact with a previously identified coronavirus case in the county. Another case involves a person who had traveled to France and returned home sick. Another case involves someone who had traveled to a religious conference in another state and came in contact with an infected person. Ferrer said one of the new cases is believed to be L.A. County’s second case of suspected community-acquired infection. That person is hospitalized.

comments_en:
Three of the positive tests were linked to the Lambeth House, a retirement home in New Orleans, the governor said.

All told, 10 of the cases are in the metro New Orleans area, state officials said. One person is either is from or hospitalized in each of Iberia, Lafourche and Caddo parishes.

The cases are considered presumptive until they are confirmed by the Centers for Disease Control.

The Chittenden County adult is being treated at the University of Vermont Medical Center. The announcement comes less than a week after the first case, a man from Bennington County, was reported. Officials say the patient is in his 70s and was hospitalized this week.

comments_en:
Gov. John Bel Edwards said the number of presumed cases of COVID-19 in Louisiana increased to 13 on Wednesday from six a day earlier, with people testing positive in Orleans, Jefferson, St. Tammany, Iberia, Lafourche and Caddo parishes.

Gov. Edwards declared a statewide public health emergency, adding that "it is worrisome" to see the coronavirus spread across the state.

Three of the positive tests were linked to the Lambeth House, a retirement home in New Orleans, the governor said.

comments: 北达科塔州第1例确诊，暂时没有更多信息
comments_en: First case of novel coronavirus confirmed in North Dakota as work continues to prevent spread

comments: 俄勒冈州Linn County新增2例。两位来自Lebanon退伍军人疗养院的80多岁老人，传染源未知。俄勒冈州累计确诊达21例。
comments_en: Two residents at a veterans’ nursing home in Lebanon in Linn County have now tested positive for coronavirus, the Oregon Health Authority announced Wednesday night. The outbreak at the Edward C. Allworth Oregon Veterans’ Home marks the first at a senior residential center in Oregon. Both infected patients are men who are believed to be at least 80 years old. It’s unclear how they became infected and the cases have been labeled as “community spread.”

comments: 休斯顿3/11晚确认一位新病患。该患者是15-25岁之间的女性，曾前往纽约州，目前在症状轻微，在家隔离。
comments_en: A female in the 15 to 25 age range, is currently experiencing mild symptoms and quarantined in her home. She recently traveled to New York state.

comments: Monroe County第1例确诊，患者曾在高风险国家旅行，现在家隔离，恢复中。
comments_en:
Monroe County officials announced the test results for the patient late Wednesday night.

No information about the individual, such as age or gender, was released.

The individual had traveled to a high risk area, officials said, noting that the patient is not one of the State University of New York students quarantined on the campus of The College at Brockport.

The patient is home in involuntary isolation and "recovering nicely," according to a statement.

comments: 弗吉尼亚州新增1例，为全州第10例患者。患者为Longwood University in FarmVille 的学生，现自我隔离。Longwood University in FarmVille 校园的活动和in-person课程都因此取消，直到3/18号。
comments_en:
Late Wednesday, Longwood University in Farmville announced that a student had tested positive for the coronavirus. That would be Virginia's 10th case.
The student is self-quarantining, university President W. Taylor Reveley IV said in a statement. Campus events and in-person classes will be canceled through at least March 18.

comments: 加州Riverside County新增1例患者，患者为Coachella Valley居民，到目前为止当地共有5例患者，都来自Coachella Valley。但是Riverside County一共宣布了7例患者其中两例为游轮患者，现在在加州隔离。
comments_en: A fifth novel coronavirus case was confirmed in Riverside County Wednesday and, like the other four, the patient is from the Coachella Valley, health officials said.

comments: 加州Tulare County新增了一例患者，该患者为Tulare County第一例病人，在病人生病期间，曾去过公共场所，具体信息不详。

comments: 犹他州第4例确诊，犹他爵士球员Rudy Gobert，新冠病毒检测呈阳性后，NBA官方宣布暂停2019-20赛季。
comments_en:
Utah Jazz player Rudy Gobert tested positive in a preliminary test for coronavirus while in Oklahoma City, the team announced Wednesday night in a statement. The NBA also announced it will suspend its season beginning Thursday.
Rudy Gobert-Bourgarel is a French professional basketball player for the Utah Jazz of the National Basketball Association. He also represents the French national basketball team in the international competitions. 
That makes four confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus in Utah.

comments: 加州Ventura County新增了一例患者，该患者为Ventura  County第二例病人，该患者有意大利旅游史，现在家自我隔离。
comments_en:
Ventura County Public Health officials are reporting a second COVID-19 case involving a Ventura County resident. They say a local resident who traveled to Italy returned to Ventura County and became symptomatic. 
That person is now recovering under home quarantine in Ventura County.

comments_en: All four cases in Delaware are from University of Delaware. Two graduate students and a postdoctoral researcher, who are under the age of 30, at the University of Delaware have tested positive for coronavirus, Delaware health officials announced late Thursday morning. They had contact at an off-campus event with the UD professor in his 50s who was announced Wednesday as the state’s first coronavirus case.

The Virginia Department of Health website states the cases are in Williamsburg. But Williamsburg city spokeswoman Lee Ann Hartmann clarified that the people live in the greater Williamsburg area, which includes three other counties.

comments: 堪萨斯州再次确诊3例新患者，与先前的首例患者没有关联。

Officials have not confirmed any information about the individual’s occupation or other surrounding circumstances, but say the Department of Public Health is continuing to investigate the case, including the point of origin and any other people with whom the individual may have come into contact.

Resident who traveled to Europe in February.

comments: 新泽西Bergen County新增2例，当地累计确诊13例。其中1例来自Teaneck，Bergen county - 年龄未知女性, 3/1参加纽约synagogue carnival接触了确诊病例.
comments_en:
Bergen County officials announced two more coronavirus cases on Thursday bringing the number of presumptive positive tests to 13 in the state’s most populous county. A person in Teaneck and another person in Englewood tested positive for the coronavirus, Bergen County Executive James Tedesco said. No additional information was given about them.
A woman, age unknown, from Teaneck. She was exposed to a confirmed case at a synagogue carnival on March 1.

comments: 周四上午旧金山新增4例，累计确诊18例。目前两位住院，两位在家隔离。其中有三位可能是社区传播，一位与之前的患者有密切接触。The Walt Disney Family Museum一名职工确诊，他的亲戚在3/9确诊。博物馆将关闭至3月20号。
comments_en: Four new cases of COVID-19 were detected in San Francisco, bringing the total number to 18 as of 10 a.m. Thursday. Two of the new patients were being treated in the hospital and two were being isolated at home, reported KRON. Three of them are suspected to have contracted the virus through community spread and one person had close contact with a known case, according to KRON. An employee at The Walt Disney Family Museum, located in San Francisco’s Presidio, has tested positive for COVID-19, according to a statement. The employee’s relative tested positive on Monday, and the museum closed on Friday, March 6. The infected employee is “doing well” and quarantined at home, and public health officials are working to notify others who may have been exposed. The museum will stay closed until March 20.

comments: 新罕布什尔第6例确诊，成年男性，欧洲多国旅行史，回美后自我隔离直至发病。

At about 6 p.m..Thursday, the district was advised by the local health authorities and the Office of Emergency Management that Old Bridge has a presumptive positive case of COVID-19 of a parent with a child in district," the website says.

Two people in Middlesex County have tested positive for the coronavirus, the first known cases there, health officials announced Wednesday.

The new patients are identified as a 58-year-old female from East Brunswick and a 74-year-old male from Edison, according to the New Jersey Department of Health. 

The East Brunswick patient has been hospitalized for several days, township police said in a community notification. 

The Edison patient’s wife is being monitored. The couple recently returned from a cruise, Edison Superintendent of Schools Bernard F. Bragen Jr. wrote in a statement on the district’s website.

comments_en: 6 new coronavirus cases announced at Oregon veterans’ home. The nursing home patients who tested positive for coronavirus are all male veterans at the Edward C. Allworth Veterans’ Home in Lebanon, the Oregon Health Authority said. One man is between the ages of 55 and 74, and the other five are 75 or older. Their illnesses are considered linked to the two earlier cases, but the exact sources of their illness are still unknown. All the infected people are quarantined at the veterans’ home, the state said.

Two people in Middlesex County have tested positive for the coronavirus, the first known cases there, health officials announced Wednesday.

The new patients are identified as a 58-year-old female from East Brunswick and a 74-year-old male from Edison, according to the New Jersey Department of Health. 

The East Brunswick patient has been hospitalized for several days, township police said in a community notification. 

The Edison patient’s wife is being monitored. The couple recently returned from a cruise, Edison Superintendent of Schools Bernard F. Bragen Jr. wrote in a statement on the district’s website.

comments: 内布拉斯加州第13例确诊，女性，60多岁，有旅行史, 现被认为是首例社区传染。
comments_en: Two presumptive positive cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) have been reported to the Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services (DHHS).  One is a man in his 50s and the other is a woman in her 60s. Both of them are from Douglas County and both of them traveled recently. The woman in her 60s is the first community spread case of coronavirus identified in Douglas County. The Douglas County Health Department's continuing investigation determined her symptoms were present before she traveled so the case is now being classified as community spread. She continues to self-isolate at home.

comments_en: Governor Ralph Northam says the number of confirmed cases of the coronavirus in Virginia has risen to 30.  The Peninsula Health District (PHD) announced today that five people, in addition to the two positive cases announced yesterday, have tested positive for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The fifth new case has an unknown exposure and the investigation is ongoing to identify where he may have acquired the virus.

comments_en:
An 8-year-old Ventura County child with an underlying health condition tested positive for COVID-19, public health officials said Friday.

"The child is already very ill from something else," Bautista said. "We don't have details on that yet."

The 8-year-old is the only child to test presumptive positive in the county. Only four of the 247 coronavirus cases in California involve children 17 or younger, according to the California Department of Public Health.

comments: 加州Ventura County新增一例患者，患者具体信息不详，但有埃及旅游史，现在家自我隔离。
comments_en: Ventura County Public Health has announced two new presumptive positive COVID-19 cases: 1) The first case is a person who had traveled from Egypt. The person has had limited public contact and remains under home quarantine. 2) The second case is an 8-year-old child. The child was treated multiple times over the past month for an underlying condition. The child has not attended school for more than 14 days. The child is now being treated at a hospital outside of Ventura County. At this time, the Ventura County Public Health Lab has conducted 112 COVID-19 tests. There is 1 positive case and 4 presumptive positive cases pending confirmation from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

comments: 夏威夷新确诊二例患者，一男一女两位患者为外来输入病例。据该州称，这对来访夫妇于3月2日抵达Maui，并住在Lahaina的一家酒店。 3月8日，这对夫妇随后乘夏威夷航空的149航班前往Kauai，并据报留在位于Lihue的Kauai Marriot度假村。
comments_en: Kauai County officials announced that two visitors on Kauai tested positive for coronavirus on March 13. According to the State, a visiting couple from the mainland arrived on Maui on March 2 and stayed at a hotel in Lahaina. On March 8, the couple then traveled to Kauai on Hawaiian Airlines flight 149 and reportedly stayed at the Kauai Marriot Resort, which is located in Lihue.

comments: 新罕布什尔第7例确诊，为Rockingham County居民，这位患者当地DMV在工作，具体时间地点请看新闻链接。
comments_en:
The New Hampshire Department of Health and Human Services announced on Friday a new presumptive positive test result for COVID-19. 
This announcement brings the total in New Hampshire to seven cases. Health officials said the newly diagnosed person is an adult female from Rockingham County who contacted their health provider after developing symptoms.
Health officials said the Manchester branch of the Division of Motor Vehicles will be closed on Saturday for enhanced cleaning and to allow DHHS to conduct their investigation.

Anyone at the Manchester DMV during those days and times has potentially been exposed to the novel coronavirus according to DHHS. 
Health officials said that the person was at the Manchester DMV at 377 South Willow Street on the following days:

Monday, March 2, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
Tuesday, March 3, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
Wednesday, March 4, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
Thursday, March 5, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
Tuesday, March 10, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

comments_en: Brunswick County announces first presumptive positive case of coronavirus. The results have been sent to the CDC lab for final confirmation. Officials said the individual is in self-isolation at home and is doing well. They had traveled to Louisiana and became symptomatic while there. There is one adult contact in the home who has been self-quarantining.

Hays County Courthouse, San Marcos, TX (March 14, 2020) – Hays County officials today reported its first presumptive case of COVID-19, also known as Coronavirus.

The patient traveled to multiple cities along the West Coast of the United States and is believed to have been exposed while traveling. Upon arrival back to Central Texas, the patient notified the Hays County Local Health Department about their symptoms.

comments: 洛杉矶新增16例，累计确诊69例。新增病例中一位感染源未知，三位近期有旅行史，两位是医疗工作者，四位与之前的确诊患者有密切接触，五位正在调查中，还有一位是昨天Long Beach Health Department报告的患者。
comments_en:
16 New Cases of Confirmed COVID-19 in Los Angeles County. To date, Public Health has identified 69 cases; of these, 10 cases are likely due to community transmission. Five of the cases confirmed today are hospitalized. Cases are occurring across LA County, so everyone should be aware and practice social distancing. 
Additional case information:

One case has an unidentified source of exposure.
Three cases were exposed during recent travel.
Two cases were healthcare workers exposed in a healthcare setting.
Four cases had close contact with a confirmed case.
Five of these cases are pending more investigation.
One is the case reported by the Long Beach Health Department late yesterday.

comments_en: The Wauwatosa Health Department received notification that an individual residing in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin has tested positive for the novel coronavirus infection (COVID-19). Upon returning to the United States, the individual was experiencing symptoms consistent with COVID-19 exposure and went to a Milwaukee area hospital for evaluation.  Following testing, the individual returned to their home and has remained under self-quarantine.

comments_en: Eight new cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed in Monroe County. This brings the total to 10 confirmed cases. Four of the eight adults who newly tested positive have a clear connection to the Greece Arcadia Middle School worker who tested positive. A separate employee of Greece Athena High School also tested positive. One of the eight new cases involved an employee at the Friendly Home in Rochester tested positive. One patient is in Rochester General Hospital, one patient is in Unity Hospital, one patient is in Highland Hospital and five patients are at home. All are said to be in isolation. 【Note】This increasing is updated by Monroe County Commissioner of Public Health Dr. Michael Mendoza, not including in New York State right now.

Coronavirus Cases Reported in Traverse City, Gaylord.

comments:
华州累计确诊1012例，官网累计Unassigned为70例，经与各县数据核查后，Unassign为58例。
以下是华州Unassign数字的更新历史：
-[3/15] 一例为Cowlitz County确诊病例，州官网尚未计入
-[3/17]下午PST3时，华州官网更新有70例Unassigned病例。
comments_en:
By 3/17,  1012 cases were confirmed in WA, 70 of them are unassigned from the State Official Site. By cross referencing with all Counties' data, the Unassigned number should be 58. 
The log of update:
- One case was reported in Cowlitz County, but not yet recorded in the State Official Site. 
- 70 cases remained unassigned in WA by 3pm PST on 3/17.

comments: 达拉斯新增9例，累计确诊达28例。这些病例包括两名20多岁的女性、一名30多岁的男性、一名40多岁的女性、两名50多岁的女性、一名60多岁的男性和一名70多岁的女性。5名患者正在住院治疗，其中3人情况危急。其中4名患者在家自我隔离。
comments_en: Dallas County health officials say nine more people have tested positive for COVID-19, bringing the total to 28. The cases include two women in their 20s, a man in his 30s, a woman in her 40s, two women in their 50s, a man in his 60s and a woman in her 70s. Five of the patients are hospitalized and three of them are in critical condition. Four of the patients are self-isolating at home.

comments_en: The county now has 19 confirmed cases.The Douglas County Health Department (DCHD) is confirming three news cases of COVID-19, the novel coronavirus.One of these cases is a man in his 20s who was in contact with another known case. The second is a man in his 30s who traveled to an area where COVID-19 is circulating and became ill after returning to Douglas County. The third new case is another man in his 30s who was exposed in another state where COVID-19 is known to be spreading.
